snippet.title: Combat Leader - 1983 - C64
snippet.description:
Combat Leader is mostly the same game as on the Atari 8bit with slight changes in the graphics. There is an extra intro screen with music, but otherwise the game does not uses the extra horse power of the C64


As the gameplay elements are the same, this game remains the same enjoyable early real time tactics game as on the Atari.
